text: Sigolsheim used to be a commune in the Haut-Rhin department of east France. On 1 January 2016, it became part of the new commune Kaysersberg-Vignoble.Arrêté 14 July 2015 Children went to school at the École élémentaire publique intercommunale which had preschool (maternelle) and elementary."École élémentaire publique intercommunale ." French Ministry of Education. Retrieved on October 6, 2016. == References == *INSEE commune file Category:Former communes in Haut-Rhin Category:2016 disestablishments in France
title: Sigolsheim
